programme.title: Μπάσκετ: Μπόστον Σέλτικς - Ντάλας Μάβερικς
programme.desc: Τελικοί. 5ος Αγώνας. Τα πλέι οφ που ανακεφαλαιώνουν τη σεζόν 2023-24 στο ΝΒΑ ξεκινούν στις 20 Απριλίου και ολοκληρώνονται με τους Τελικούς. 16 ομάδες, συμπεριλαμβανομένων των πρωταθλητών Ντένβερ Νάγκετς, συμμετέχουν στην postseason. Περιγραφή: Ρήγας Δάρδαλης.

programme.desc: Lega Basket Serie A 2023-24. 4ος Τελικός. Το ιταλικό πρωτάθλημα μπάσκετ ετοιμάζεται να μας δώσει μια συναρπαστική νέα σεζόν. Η πρωταθλήτρια Αρμάνι Μιλάνου και η Βίρτους Μπολόνια θα εξακολουθήσουν να παλεύουν για τον τίτλο ή θα πρέπει να περιμένουμε εκπλήξεις; Θα το μάθουμε τον Ιούνιο. Περιγραφή: Γιάννης Φιλέρης.

programme.title: NBA Action 2023-24
programme.desc: H αθλητική εκπομπή μεταφέρει στους Έλληνες φιλάθλους όλα τα νέα για το μαγικό κόσμο του ΝΒΑ, με συνεντεύξεις και αφιερώματα.

programme.title: Μπάσκετ: Φενέρμπαχτσε - Αναντολού Εφές
programme.desc: Turkish Basketball Super League 2023-24. 4ος Τελικός. Φενέρμπαχτσε και Αναντολού Εφές προβάλλουν ως φαβορί για τον τίτλο στην 58η σεζόν του τουρκικού πρωταθλήματος μπάσκετ, όπου συμμετέχουν συνολικά 16 ομάδες. Μπόντρουμσπορ και Σάμψουνσπορ είναι οι νεοφώτιστες. Περιγραφή: Άρης Μπάρκας.

programme.title: Μπάσκετ: Τενερίφη - Μάλαγα
programme.desc: FIBA Basketball Champions League 2023-24. Φάιναλ 4, Τελικός. Η 8η σεζόν του Basketball Champions League περιλαμβάνει 32 ομάδες που θα πρέπει να περάσουν από την κανονική περίοδο, τα playoffs και το Final Four προκειμένου να αναδειχθεί η διάδοχος της κατόχου του τροπαίου Βόννης. Περιγραφή: Ρήγας Δάρδαλης, Άρης Μπάρκας.

programme.title: NBA Specials
programme.desc: 75 Stories: Curry, Nash, Cousy & Payton. Στιγμιότυπα από το NBA.

programme.title: Blast from the Past
programme.desc: Γκόλντεν Στέιτ Ουόριορς - Κλίβελαντ Καβαλίερς (7ος τελικός ΝΒΑ 2016). O Λε Μπρον Τζέιμς οδήγησε το 2016 τους Καβαλίερς στο 1ο πρωτάθλημα της ιστορίας τους με μια επική ανατροπή απέναντι στους Ουόριορς. Ο Βασίλης Σκουντής και ο Ρήγας Δάρδαλης μάς μεταφέρουν όλα όσα έζησαν στη μαγική αυτή βραδιά.

programme.title: Ισπανικό Πρωτάθλημα 2023-24 - 5η Περίοδος
programme.desc: Δείτε τα καλύτερα στιγμιότυπα της 5ης περιόδου του Ισπανικού Πρωταθλήματος μπάσκετ.

programme.title: ERC 2024
programme.desc: Με χρονιά εκκίνησης το 1953, το Ευρωπαϊκό Πρωτάθλημα Ράλι της FIA γίνεται 70 ετών το 2023 με ένα πρόγραμμα 8 γύρων που διεξάγεται σε άσφαλτο και χαλίκι. Πρόκειται για το απόλυτο πεδίο προπόνησης για τα νέα ταλέντα που στοχεύουν στην κορυφή του αθλήματος. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Κυριαζής.

programme.desc: Η ετήσια σειρά μίτινγκ στίβου αποτελεί τη δεύτερη τη τάξει διοργάνωση μετά το Diamond League και το πρώτο 'μονοπάτι' για τους αθλητές προς τις μεγάλες διοργανώσεις του κλασικού αθλητισμού, με συνολικά 12 events σε 4 ηπείρους. Περιγραφή: Γιάννης Φιλέρης.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter With Scott Van Pelt
programme.desc: SVP's up at midnight and bringing his unique perspective on games people play to "SportsCenter" viewers. The hourlong, late-night show is driven by the host's self-deprecating wit and passion for sports, with featured elements, including Van Pelt's nightly "1 Big Thing" commentary and a weekly look back at the moments that drove bettors wild in "Bad Beats." The show also delivers what "SportsCenter" fans are used to -- news and highlights, guests and interviews -- but in a different, fast-paced and insightful way.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Live: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith joins host Molly Qerim on this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: Live: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee brings his humor and candor to the microphone to highlight the day's top stories.

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali in the ESPN studio and joined via satellite by four panelists from across the country, the team debates popular sports stories. Reali acts as moderator, giving points for well-made arguments and deducting points for those who inspire him to hit the "mute" button. At the end of the show, whomever Reali deems the winner has 30 seconds without interruption to voice their final opinions on any topic they want.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Hardwood Classics
programme.sub-title: 1972: Los Angeles Lakers at Atlanta Hawks
programme.desc: The Lakers defeated the Hawks 134-90 for their 33rd consecutive victory, a record that still stands as the longest win streak in professional sports. Jim McMillan and Gail Goodrich scored 26 and 23 points respectively. From Jan. 7, 1972.

programme.title: Hardwood Classics
programme.sub-title: 1972 NBA Finals: Los Angeles Lakers at New York Knicks

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: Longtime hit man Jimmy Conlon (Liam Neeson), best friend of mob boss Shawn Maguire (Ed Harris), has seen better days. He's haunted both by the sins of his past and a police detective who's been breathing down his neck for 30 years, and the only comfort Jimmy has is whiskey. However, when his estranged son (Joel Kinnaman) becomes a mob target, Jimmy figures that the only way to atone for his past mistakes is to make sure that his son doesn't wind up at the wrong end of a gun.

programme.title: Den of Thieves
programme.desc: Nick O'Brien is the hard-drinking leader of the Regulators, an elite unit of the Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department. Ray Merrimen is the recently paroled leader of the Outlaws, a gang of ex-military men who use their expertise and tactical skills to evade the law. O'Brien, Merriman and their squads soon find themselves on a direct collision course as the criminals hatch an elaborate plan for a seemingly impossible heist -- the city's Federal Reserve Bank.

programme.title: Gone in Sixty Seconds
programme.desc: Randall "Memphis" Raines long ago abandoned his life of crime, but after an ominous visit from an old friend, he finds he has no choice but to return to what he does best -- stealing cars -- in order to save his brother's life. It all comes down to one night, 50 cars and a contract.

programme.title: Creed II
programme.desc: In 1985, Russian boxer Ivan Drago killed former U.S. champion Apollo Creed in a tragic match that stunned the world. Against the wishes of trainer Rocky Balboa, Apollo's son Adonis Johnson accepts a challenge from Drago's son -- another dangerous fighter. Under guidance from Rocky, Adonis trains for the showdown of his life -- a date with destiny that soon becomes his obsession. Now, Johnson and Balboa must confront their shared legacy as the past catches up to both men.

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A man wearing a surveillance wire is shot to death at point-blank range in downtown Los Angeles; interpersonal relationships on the squad force Brenda into a corner.

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Provenza and Flynn lose the evidence in an attempted murder case when Provenza's car is stolen; Pope is not happy when Brenda is forced to free the suspect and gives her and the squad 48 hours to retrieve the car, the evidence and the suspect.

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: When a 12-year-old disappears, Brenda must decide whether to treat him as a runaway or a missing person.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: After Cole's true identity is revealed, Phoebe must decide between following her heart or defying her sisters.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When a she-demon takes possession of Piper before her 10-year high-school reunion, it is up to Prue and Phoebe to save their unsightly sister.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.sub-title: We All Scream for Ice Cream
programme.desc: An evil ice-cream man lures Prue and Phoebe into another dimension, where they are tricked into harming an innocent person.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters battle a warlock who exterminates witches and takes their powers; an interfering "Whitelighter" causes friction between Piper and Leo.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Anna remembers her past, allowing Sam and Dean to understand why Castiel and Uriel want her dead; Alastair and his demons close in on Anna, Dean and Sam.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean and Sam investigate the appearance of a ghost in an abandoned house, but things get more complicated when a family moves in.

programme.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
programme.desc: Life is a struggle for single father Chris Gardner (Will Smith). Evicted from their apartment, he and his young son (Jaden Christopher Syre Smith) find themselves alone with no place to go. Even though Chris eventually lands a job as an intern at a prestigious brokerage firm, the position pays no money. The pair must live in shelters and endure many hardships, but Chris refuses to give in to despair as he struggles to create a better life for himself and his son.

programme.title: King Richard
programme.desc: Armed with a clear vision and a brazen, 78-page plan, Richard Williams is determined to write his two daughters, Venus and Serena, into history. Training on tennis courts in Compton, Calif., Richard shapes the girls' unyielding commitment and keen intuition. Together, the Williams family defies seemingly insurmountable odds and the prevailing expectations laid before them.

programme.title: Creed II
programme.desc: In 1985, Russian boxer Ivan Drago killed former U.S. champion Apollo Creed in a tragic match that stunned the world. Against the wishes of trainer Rocky Balboa, Apollo's son Adonis Johnson accepts a challenge from Drago's son -- another dangerous fighter. Under guidance from Rocky, Adonis trains for the showdown of his life -- a date with destiny that soon becomes his obsession. Now, Johnson and Balboa must confront their shared legacy as the past catches up to both men.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: They are the best-kept secret in the universe. Working for a highly funded yet unofficial government agency, Kay (Tommy Lee Jones) and Jay (Will Smith) are the Men in Black, providers of immigration services and regulators of all things alien on Earth. While investigating a series of unregistered close encounters, the MIB agents uncover the deadly plot of an intergalactic terrorist who is on a mission to assassinate two ambassadors from opposing galaxies currently in residence in New York City.

programme.title: Men in Black 2
programme.desc: Kay (Tommy Lee Jones) and Jay (Will Smith) reunite to provide our best line of defense against a seductress who levels the toughest challenge yet to the MIBs mission statement: protecting the earth from the scum of the universe. While investigating a routine crime, Jay uncovers a plot masterminded by Serleena (Boyle), a Kylothian monster who disguises herself as a lingerie model. When Serleena takes the MIB building hostage, there is only one person Jay can turn to -- his former MIB partner.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Even though agents J (Will Smith) and K (Tommy Lee Jones) have been protecting the Earth from alien scum for many years, J still does not know much about his gruff partner. However, J soon gets an unexpected chance to find out what makes K tick when an alien criminal called Boris the Animal (Jemaine Clement) escapes, goes back to 1969, and kills K. With the fate of the planet at stake, J goes back in time and teams up with K's younger self (Josh Brolin) to put things right.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: NCIS agents McGee and Torres head to New Orleans to partner with Pride and his team in the search for the missing homeland security theoretical terror playbook.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Painful memories come flooding back when a gruesome copycat murder leads to the reopening of a case for Wade.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride's longtime friend, state and military attorney Rita Devereaux, asks NCIS to investigate the disappearance of a JAG lawyer who specializes in classified cases and volunteers at a private military academy.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A highly skilled special operations Marine assaults six men in a bar, sending the NCIS team on a city-wide manhunt.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When Prue discovers that her ex-boyfriend is mutating into a demon, she and her sisters battle for his soul in an underworld wrestling ring.

programme.title: Charmed

programme.title: Charmed
programme.sub-title: The Good, the Bad and the Cursed
programme.desc: When Phoebe becomes caught up in a ghost town's violent past, Prue must travel back in time to rescue her sister from an appalling fate.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Piper's wedding day is jeopardized when Prue is arrested on suspicion of murder after her astral self engages in late-night shenanigans.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Prue staves off the Angel of Death while trying to save someone's life, but she ultimately comes to terms with the inevitable.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: As Piper and Leo prepare to move out, the sisters remember what life was like before they found out they were the most powerful witches of all time.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A demon forces the sisters to wrestle with the seven deadly sins -- greed, pride, envy, anger, gluttony, lust and sloth.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.sub-title: The Demon Who Came in From the Cold
programme.desc: Cole infiltrates an underworld brotherhood to learn about an evil entity, but the sisters fear they may be betrayed.

programme.title: Blades of Glory
programme.desc: Figure skaters Chazz Michael Michaels and Jimmy MacElroy take their intense rivalry too far during the Olympic Winter Games in Salt Lake City; both are banned from competition after a nasty brawl. After several years out of the public eye and hungry for glory, the men decide to set aside their feud and exploit a loophole that allows them to compete as a pair.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: They are the best-kept secret in the universe. Working for a highly funded yet unofficial government agency, Kay (Tommy Lee Jones) and Jay (Will Smith) are the Men in Black, providers of immigration services and regulators of all things alien on Earth. While investigating a series of unregistered close encounters, the MIB agents uncover the deadly plot of an intergalactic terrorist who is on a mission to assassinate two ambassadors from opposing galaxies currently in residence in New York City.

programme.title: Trans World Sport
programme.desc: Interesantne priče i neobični sportovi iz svih delova sveta. Uvek ćete biti u toku uz ovu emisiju.

programme.title: Profi boks: Zayas - Teixeira
programme.desc: Roki Marčano, Majk Tajson, Šugar Rej Robinson, Muhamed Ali, Džo Luis. Treba li još koji razlog više da bi pratili ovu plemenitu borilačku veštinu? Prve tragove boksa nalazimo već u trećem veku pre...

programme.title: Bundesliga serijal - Tobogan za opstanak
programme.desc: Dokumentarni serijal o nemačkom državnom prvenstvu u fudbalu koje se smatra jednim od najjačih na svetu.

programme.title: Odbojka - Liga nacija (M): Italy - Poland
programme.desc: Liga nacija (m) je nova vrsta takmičenja u muškoj odbojci koja zamenjuje staru Svetsku ligu. Novi format turnira će privući pažnju svakog istinskog ljubitelja odbojke.

programme.title: Zlatni momenti YU sporta
programme.desc: Momenti koji su obeležili bogatu istoriju jugoslovenskog sporta.

programme.desc: Liga nacija (m) je nova vrsta takmičenja u muškoj odbojci koja zamenjuje staru Svetsku ligu. Novi format turnira će privući pažnju svakog istinskog ljubitelja odbojke. (LIVE).

programme.title: ATP Uncovered
programme.desc: Teniseri su gotovo celu godinu na putovanjima. Saznajte nešto više o tome kako izgleda njihov život na terenu i van njega i kako organizatori ATP turnira rešavaju slatke i gorke muke koje imaju.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Trenuci koji će zauvek ostati upisani u istoriji sporta. Koševi, golovi i dostignuća koja su uvek neiscrpna tema među ljubiteljima sporta...

programme.title: Odbojka - Liga nacija (Ž): F8 - 1/4 Finale: China - Japan
programme.desc: Ženska odbojkaška Liga nacija je takmičenje reprezentacija osnovano 2018. godine. 16 reprezentacija bori se za titulu prvaka. (LIVE).

programme.title: Trans World Sport
programme.desc: Interesantne priče i neobični sportovi iz svih delova sveta. Uvek ćete biti u toku uz ovu emisiju.

programme.title: Sport kakav pamtimo: Miodrag Miško Marić
programme.desc: Česta fraza koju sada čujemo je "U moje vreme je sve bilo bolje..." Pogledajte kakav je nekada bio sport i ovo je idealna šansa za mlade da vide da li je nekada zaista bilo bolje...

programme.title: Odbojka - Liga nacija (Ž): F8 - 1/4 Finale: Thailand - Brazil
programme.desc: Ženska odbojkaška Liga nacija je takmičenje reprezentacija osnovano 2018. godine. 16 reprezentacija bori se za titulu prvaka. (LIVE).

programme.title: Mini-fudbal - EURO: Finale: Serbia - France 111
programme.desc: Nešto između futsala i pravog fudbala, ovaj sport iz godine u godinu ima sve više pristalica. U Bosni i Hercegovini će snage odmeriti najbolje reprezentacije Evrope.

programme.title: Odbojka - Liga nacija (M): Turkey - Argentina
programme.desc: Liga nacija (m) je nova vrsta takmičenja u muškoj odbojci koja zamenjuje staru Svetsku ligu. Novi format turnira će privući pažnju svakog istinskog ljubitelja odbojke.

programme.title: Track & Field
programme.desc: "Track & Field" jedan je od najcenjenijih atletskih magazina koji pokriva sva najzanimljivija atletska svetska takmičenja, preko američkih studentskih takmičenja do Olimpijskih igara.

programme.title: Košarka - Euroleague: F4 Finale: Real Madrid - Panathinaikos
programme.desc: Najjače klupsko takmičenje u košarci na području Evrope svake sezone privlači pažnju velikog broja zaljubljenika košarku. Kao takmičenje visokog kvaliteta verujemo da će privući vašu pažnju.

programme.title: F1 Imola: Trka
programme.desc: Velika nagrada Emilije Romanje je trka automobila Formule 1 koja se vozi na stazi "Enco i Dino Ferari" u Imoli, u istoimenoj italijanskoj regiji.

programme.title: Fast Zone
programme.desc: U ovoj emisiji, videćemo šta se dešava na serijama koje ne prenosi Sport Klub. I ovde ima kvalitetnih i ambicioznih vozača koji žele da se probiju u sam vrh.

programme.title: Odbojka - Liga nacija (M): Cuba - Slovenia
programme.desc: Liga nacija (m) je nova vrsta takmičenja u muškoj odbojci koja zamenjuje staru Svetsku ligu. Novi format turnira će privući pažnju svakog istinskog ljubitelja odbojke.

programme.title: Uži izbor
programme.desc: Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste. Neko će probati ono o čemu se decenijama priča...

programme.title: Bundesliga Specijal: Golovi sezone
programme.desc: Svakog meseca, Bundesliga šalje specijalnu emisiju o najboljim igračima, tehnologijama koje se koriste za prenose i trenerima koji donose razliku...

programme.title: Fudbal - Litvanska liga: Zalgiris Vilnus - Penevezys
programme.desc: Liga je nastala 1991. godine, posle raspada Sovjetskog Saveza. Trenutni prvak lige je Suduva, a Žalgiris je to bio čak sedam puta.

programme.title: Košarka - Eurocup: Finale (G1): Paris - Bourg
programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke.

programme.title: Košarka - Eurocup: Finale (G2): Bourg - Paris
programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke.
